```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(here)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
resilience <- read_csv(here("data", "community-resilience-estimates.csv"))
```

```{r}
head(resilience)
```

```{r}
totals <- resilience %>%
  group_by(ctname, rfgrp) %>%
  summarise(sum = sum(prednum)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = ctname, values_from = sum)
```
